Blog.post: urlLink urlLink What Name Should You Have? by urlLink Lauren
i was doing my work. everything was so ordinary. until the song 'have you ever' started playing on my winamp. damn it. it all comes back to me again.

went cineleisure to do project work today. yeah... u may wonder what a place for project work. but i thot the ambience of the cafe was quite good. jiaying agrees too. but i think the boys dun. anyway, true enuff, our whole group juz stone there. seems like our group is known to be the stoner group in class. we stoned for like 15mins b4 we finally start talking. but really, there isnt much talking. much of the time, there's pauses and silence. but i think we'll manage to scrape thru in the end. after the meeting, jiaying n i decided to visit the library to do more research. luckily, we found some really useful materials. den i also made a reservation on the book can you keep a secret by sohpie kinsella .i really love the author. though i dun read often. ive only read one of her books, 'shopaholic ties the knot' and i think it's really one of the best books ive read so far. anyway, its already so late at nite and early in the morning. 1.41am now. damn. n i have not managed to finish my revision on literature. im going to WILD WILD WET later with xiaoyun and meiling. have to wake up at 7.30!! damn....ml la....insist on going there early. haha.... so i have like five hrs to sleep! damn.... n i wanna start on my lit revision now cuz i m kinda energetic now. (weird...) but wateva.....i think the waters will prevent me from dozing off tml.

im in a so damn bad mood. stupid exams. why must we study for exams? isnt o levels enuff to torture us? arghhhhhh....!!! this really sucks. i dun wanna study for exams! somebody, save me!!! there's juz two more weeks and i juz started on maths cuz it's my fave subject. i haven touch history nor literature one bit. this is really scary. i haven read finish decline and fall n even if i do, i have no freaking idea what the whole plot is about. what the hell! TWO MORE WEEKS! econs. what econs? i have no clue what freaking ms kelly tan was talking about for the past 6 mths. arghhhh!!! maybe i should drop one subject. yup, i'll either drop history or lit. or econs. any one of them. den maybe my life will be much better.

project work really sucks. the tiger beer head of advertising is pushing her job to someone else n now, it seems tat our project is getting nowhere. this is really scary, to think tat it's gonna be counted in our A level results. anyway, clarence called yesterday and told me he has started studying for exams. this really freak me out. clarence chew has started studying for exams but i have not. im so dead. ok...maybe i have started a teeny weeny bit on GP but i guess it's still not enuff. since clarence has started studying, i guess the rest of the ppl have started mugging weeks ago. but im really tired. everytime i wanna sit down n study, i feel like sleeping again. and i finally have an excuse for sleeping in class next time: i went to the doc tat day n he said tat i have low blood pressure. so it means tat i feel tired easily and too much exercise can actually make me faint. =S. didnt know im tat weak. anyway, i think i shall start studying today. if possible. to clarence : congrats on winning the bball match. yeah, n u scored the most pts. so proud of u. hahaha...
urlLink
urlLink disney puzzle tat xiaoyun gave me! thanks babe!

yup, went to catch harry potter with janice yesterday. so glad i have the pair of free tics from my dad, or i'll be seriously broke. spent quite alot yesterday, on kenneth's present, on my facial foam, taxi fare.... blah blah. n i'm going to buy my dad's present n some stationary at popular today. im seriously broke . saw alot of ppl at PS: yong chuen, alvin yap, kendrick, choo kiat, weian, xie min, hweemin, and alot more! anyway, harry potter is not bad . yeah, juz not bad. cuz i've expected much better stuff from this movie since prisoner of azkaban is my fave book among the rest. yeah..there's more action in this movie but the plot kinda sucks. as in, it's very rushed and so on. but on the whole, i shall give it... four popcorns . hahah.. anyway, bought kenneth this very exquisite gun lighter. yup, aaron, xiaoyun, janice and i shared the present. hehe. think he'll like it. at least it's much better than the soap and facial foam we bought him last yr. =) so we're going out with him later. to celebrate his bdae. hope he doenst read my blog b4 he meets us or he'll know wat's in store for him! anyway, happy advanced bdae, kenneth!
urlLink marianne's brother on the left and fariza's brother on the right! damn cute rite? =)
urlLink krys and i. haha...forever taking photos.
urlLink jaNiCe anD i! notice our uniforms! yup, we switched! sajc uniform is damn cool la...

thanks a million zillion, xiaoyun ! for giving me the disney princess puzzle !! i love you!! =) n the most touching part is, u actually pieced the puzzle yourself! (...and abit by ur sis, rite? =p) i love the puzzle! it's on my bedroom wall now. cinderella rocks~

went to tj dance nite with xiaoyun yesterday. finally got to see her, so happy! xy didnt change much, still so cute and sporty. =) anyway, the dance nite was quite spectacular. there's this break dance and seriously, those dancers were much better than the break dancers from vj music fest. i only know two dancers there, sookching and shella . shella can really dance well! ( durrrr ) actually, i didnt know she can dance hip hop so well. you go, girl! as for sook, not bad also. she likes to smile alot, tat's wat i know. saw boon keng her bf there too. come to think abt it, they've been together for quite some time. anyway, rj dance club performed too. wat the hell.. all the girls were wearing adidas stuff from head to toe. show off! den i remembered how marianne and i actually tried to do the rj slang in front of rj tat time. haha. oh..den i saw pengyu also. haha. it was quite awkward for me to wave to him. all bcuz of charmaine! haha. go tell him i said he looks like mark lee. i saw alot of ppl i know at the dance nite. think i saw jan siau too. haha... but she looks slimmer, so i dunno whether i got the right one. anyway, xiaoyun really got loud frens huh? haha... daphne and khim rong and olivia . haha.. it's been like, few yrs since i last saw khim rong. she kept asking me whether she has grown fatter. haha... hard question. as for daphne, she's really cool. she looks pretty. but i guess she'll prefer ppl to say she's handsome . =) gotta rush for my hist essay now. tata!

my computer is finally fixed!! im such a genius! hahah.. thanks riliang for asking me to go to the control panel and sort everything out. i dunno tat control panel is actually the 'main computer storage place'...whatever u put it. n my printer is fixed too!! i feel so relieved suddenly. but now, my hist essay is still undone.... i'll either do it later or tml morning since i have to go to sch tml. yeah..for wat? for mass dance. sounds pretty dumb. the taiwan immersion students have to perform for the taiwanese students. n vj decided to do mass dance. so typical. we doing 'i want you'...i'll prefer neutron dance or la bamba...

finally added some more stuffs onto my blog, can see the diff? haha... added the links and did sth to the cursor. other than tat, actually there is not much change. but i actually spent three hrs doing all these! guess i really know nuts abt IT. ok, i've decided not to go to that metro sale at expo. krys said her fren said the stuffs there are very cheapskate. =S den heeren is under renovation now i heard. juz went taka yesterday. hmm... think there's not much places to shop anymore. which is a good sign actually. bcuz it means i finally have time to study for exams..i hope? i have less than three weeks to study now. i wonder if everyone else has started studying. im going out with jan on monday~! cant wait for it. gonna catch harry potter !! ive waited for like, half a yr for the movie to be out. dying to see ron weasley . meiling! riliang! weechin! all the best for your sailing comp! though i dunno how the comp is like. izzt see which boat reach the checkpt first? haha! bball seems like an easier sport. anyway, juz realised i know quite a number of sailormoons. hahah...
so sorry guys! i screwed up my template and now, there's no more tagboard! =( i'm trying my best to retreive them back. if not, i shall have a new one den.

today's a pretty hectic day. had to wake up so early to go sch for hist lec. it's for the 2nd intake only actually but i juz went anyway since i had not really been paying attention during hist lecs for the past half yr. anyway, after the hist lec was hist tut paper3 which was initially interesting but got boring later when i cldnt really catch wat ms goh was saying. n tat reminds me... i have to hand up a hist essay by this week. darn... anyway, think i havent mentioned previously but i am chosen for the taiwan immersion programme ! yup.. it means tat this taiwanese girl will come to stay at my urlLink house during early aug and i'll go over to stay at taiwan during dec~ sounds really cool to me since i've wanted to visit taiwan again since i fall in urlLink love with jay chou . lol!! this sat's the tj dance nite i think. n i think i'm going.... rite xy? cuz i have not urlLink contact her since few weeks ago n i dun really know whether she has got the tics. haha. i really hope we can meet up this sat!

hey guys! well.... juz thot of changing my blog. too bored. nth to do. haha... anyway. hope u'll like the new blog better! if not, i shall change it back to the xanga one. =) for those who dunno, my old blog is http://www.xanga.com/s4sharon!!

we should have won. we could have won. but we lost. yeah, the inter-ct captain's ball tournament . cant believe that we actually got kicked out at the second round. we were winning in the first half but perhaps the opponents were too strong or their cheerleaders were simply too loud. our class did not have any supporters at all. still, we should have won. but we lost. still, you guys were terrific: fariza, marianne, clarence, max, zav, jianyong . we are such a great team. haha. the taiwanese student is coming tml. cant wait for it. juz know her name but dunno how she looks like. she's called xiao ning . sounds so demure. im not sure where to bring her these two weeks. seems like they've already toured orchard almost every night this week so now, i dunno where to bring her to shop. but char said we'll take her to take neoprints! haha. char n her can take all they want. i hate taking neoprints. talking abt char. i really do stupid things whenever im with her la (and she still said it's she always do stupid things whenever she's with me). anyway, the vj snack machine is a horror. we thot the opening was only a small gap and couldnt pull out the cup of instant noodle. so in the end, we tried pulling n squeezing the cup of noodle out of the snack machine for 15 minutes! everyone ard us was looking at us. den i realised that the opening could actually be pushed further and both of us started laughing like mad women. few ppl ard us were laughing hysterically as well. -_- haha. den before that, jun wei, char n i were talking at the stone table. and char n i were talking abt my 'f maths' again. n she didnt tell me junwei was from dhs also! juz hope junwei doesnt tell 'f maths' abt it. =) see? i always make a fool of myself whenever im with charmaine. hahaha... but you're still so sweet la. tried to cheer me up after the game today. really appreciated that! lurve ya! today's already friday and max still hasnt get big-head girl's number. loser la u. hahaha.... max broke my heart man. he kept saying that 'f maths' is damn ugly. damn ugly. how can it be! i think he's damn cool la. even krys agrees with me rite? haha.

life's quite stressful now. especially after getting back the result slip. yeah, though i didnt fail any subject, i still think i did really badly. dunno how to break the news to my mother. i really wanna concentrate n study but i juz feel damn tired n not movitated. promos is juz 9 more weeks away, can u ever imagine tat? damn... n im gonna waste two full weeks to entertain the taiwanese student. n tat leaves me with like 7 weeks. horror of horrors! maybe i shld drop a subject. i have been thinking of dropping history since im really not into this subject at all. i know it is interesting to understand n stuff but to study for it makes me puke. i cant see myself memorising every single event in the pages of history. tat's juz so ridiculous. i wanna drop lit too but i noe i shldnt give up on lit easily since ive pulled thru it for Os. man.....why am i even thinking abt dropping subjects? whatever it is, all rite......i shall tell myself this: im gonna work hard in two week's time, after the taiwanese student leave. im gonna mug all day n all nite, regardless of how tired i am. but i need someone or something to motivate me. hmmm...i think ive found it. yup. cheer for me, guys!

"Don't ever give up if you still want to try, don't ever wipe your tears if you still want to cry. Don't ever settle for an answer if you still want to know. Don't ever say you don't love him if you can't let him go."

today was college day. man....that was one boring ceremony. since the performing theatre cld only contain 800 ppl, the rest of the sch was assigned to stay in other lect theatres to watch the ceremony. everyone was not really paying attention...chattting and playing cards on their own. after that, went parkway with charmaine. we laughed alot on stupid things, like 'yours' and 'mine' hehe... she was telling me abt jaron. that he always skip sch but still so clever. takes two S papers...my god! one of them was phy somemore. smart guy. suddenly, im so inspired to be like him. haha. going my grandma's bdae party tml. have not seen my relatives for quite some time. but i think it's gonna be kinda boring. since the ppl going to the party is dwindling each yr. the adults juz seemed to have sth on n will not go. how unfilial. luckily, my whole family will be going. anyway, lots of hw to do! wanna finish them by tonite. dunno can or not. let's see. i shall do econs drq...den i'll do chinese compo. den if i have time i shall attempt to do the vectors assignment, though i still have no clue wat vectors is abt.

My inner child is sixteen years old! Life's not fair! It's never been fair, but while adults might just accept that, I know something's gotta change. And it's gonna change, just as soon as I become an adult and get some power of my own. urlLink How Old is Your Inner Child? brought to you by

Vj had half day off today cuz we’ve been winning quite a lot of titles n awards recently. So went back to zhss with daryl and aaron to collect the leaving cert. The school didn’t change much, still as lifeless and dull. So I dun really miss the environment, it’s the ppl tat I miss. Anyway, the first teacher we saw was mr lim yong khern . He’s still as charming and handsome as ever. Really melts my heart. Haha… as usual, he was scolding this boy n making him run round the parade square. He was like, ‘harlow!’ to us and then turned ard and shouted at the boy. -_- contrast. We didn’t get to see other teachers cuz apparently, they’re having some conferencing. Anyway, aaron is leaving for Australia soon. Cant believe it. Two of my closest guy frens are leaving spore. =( feel very sad for cindy also. But im sure they’ll be able to keep up with the long distance relationship. Asked aaron why does he have to go but his reasons are kinda vague. Dunno what he talking abt also. But I’ll wish him all the best. Oh yeah, charmaine is so sweet. she asked me out tml cuz she knows I went shopping alone today. Haha. But seriously, I really like to shop alone… I think it’s rather fun. After some time, I realized im not tat monophobic anymore. =)

today's a emotionally busy day. in the morning, i felt happy. late morning, i felt jealous. in the afternoon, i felt better. in the evening, i felt angry. at nite, i felt rejected. late nite, i felt happy again. this is gettin nowhere.

BEAUTIFUL ICE PRINCESS/PRINCE .You need distance between you and your partner in your relationship. You are very difficult to get. You have big requirements and this one you love must try hard to get you. But after she/he melt your heart she/he will be the most happy person in the world. You need someone who shoes you that you are special and it makes you feel good to see that you are loved. She/He shall know that you could easily get another girl/boyfriend but you wont as long as you love him. when she/he hurts you you will hurt him too, but in general you dont get hurt. If your partner cheated you ,you would react cold and immediately (try to) forget him urlLink ~THE big LOVE TEST!! What do you need? With PICS! For girls and boys!~ brought to you by
urlLink brotherhood is good.

watched Brotherhood with janice juz now. oh my god....it's a damn nice show!!! seriously, it has the plot and the good looking characters. really touching movie. like it alot since i've always like war films tat features family issues like armageddon. but i guess armageddon is still more sad n touching than brotherhood but still!!! WON BIN ROCKS!!! he's so damn freaking handsome in the show, even with blood smeared all over his face n body. luckily, he didnt die in the end, unlike wat krys told me. haha. but his brother died. so sad.... anyway, after learning abt the korean war during hist, seems like ive got a better understanding of the movie and why his bro became a communist in the end. hmm... at least find some good uses of studying hist. and once again..... WON BIN ROCKS!!!! i'll give the movie four popcorns!

had not blog for a long time! hmm... guess im juz pretty busy with school. dunno busy with what also. stressed! haha... but still enjoying myself i guess. anyway, exams are finally over few weeks ago but until now, ive only got back maths results! hmm... think arts fac is like tat. went to do project work today. all the way to jurong east library! but had quite a fun time there. our group was sitting at the study table and suddenly, max and jian yong started to wave at every single person who passed by outside the window! some frenly ppl waved back but others juz thought that these two guys are mad! haha. anyway, the professors that we emailed to finally replied back. few are willing to accept the interview. hurray!! really hope that we can finish pw asap. it really sucks big time. but oral presentation will be fun i guess. anyway, going to nj tml. have taiwan immersion programme rehearsal again. we're gonne wear long sleeves shirt with a tie and jeans. tried them on juz now, looks totally like a guy. hahaha... anyway, im auditioning for the host for the TIP. dun think can make it ba. the hc students are all so pro in their chinese. speak with a china slang somemore. but i guess i'll juz try out for the fun of it. char msged me juz now asking me to go support her at PS tml. she's doing flag day. hohoho... i wanna go see her so much but dunno whether there's time for me or not. haha. char is one funny girl la. damn cute. but her earrings are even cuter rite? (*winks) lastly, juz wanna say that 'accidentally in love' really rocks. damn nice song. must dl! also, 'f maths' rocks! (think only krystle knows wat i mean. hahaahah)

went out with aiktat they all yesterday. yingshing, janice, shiling, cindy, peiling, pohsi, rouchi, joanne, aiktat and i to be precise. anyway, had quite a fun time. had not seen some of the peeps for quite some time. miss them. =) guess they haven change much. yingshing, cindy and shiling were still as funny as before. anyway, im at xiaoyun's house now. having a sleepover again, the three of us. we juz played DJs juz now. pretended to be perfect10 and class 95 crew and faked those accents. silly but really funny and fun. oh...watched love actually juz now too, how can i forget. the uncensored version. think i need to wash my eyes thoroughly tonite. its kinda nice show. cant believe i'll actually watch a love comedy since im always so against it. but i guess love actually is kinda ok. and suddenly, im hook onto talking abt colin firth when i dun even like him. hugh grant is much better i guess. soooooooo charming. if only spore can have him as a prime minster instead. den i guess teenagers in spore will be more apathetic towards politics and stuff. =) guess we're gonna do some 'filming' later. act as ah sohs again. whahaha.... but really, we're running out of ideas. tat's all i guess. to hungry to type somemore. cya~~

aik tat is back from aust. haha. went out with aaron and him today. abit weird. dunno why. think aaron and i too stressed over exams den didnt talk much. only let aiktat do the talking. sorry, brother! juz tat im not in a really good mood today after such a long day outside. but really happy tat u're back. going out with him again tml with the rest of the gang. kinda miss them. going to the lau di fang s11 to eat. haha... hope it'll be fun. sorry xy n ml tat ive to postpone the sleepover bcuz of this! lookin forward to it as much as the dinner!

Tired of this barrier between -us- Sinister clouds litter above, with no one to clear the sky. We're treading on a no man's land: Any attempt to cross it meant death. We're dead, dead in the heart and soul, for the hurt has erased our happiness and we- Wait, since when is there happiness? Please, allow me to close my eyes. All these pains and sufferings have induced me to sleep. An endless walk with no light, no one to guide me through. An endless fight against no one, winning nothing. Perhaps, it shall end soon. In the end, i will still lie A l o n e .

this morning was a disaster. i woke up half falling asleep. den went school like a zombie with linda. cuz of the dinner yesterday. lucky shuan drove us home yesterday, ok, it's his father. haha. today played squash with linda. stupid game la..not fun. bball is better. =) then in the afternoon, went to aljunied studio for some practice. damn, i really think my voice sucks. esp when im singing guy songs. yeah, gonna audition for the senior dance n dinner nite performance. the rest of the band is damn good but i think my voice spoilt everything. but they are really damn nice. gave me a cookie from famous amos cuz clarence said i looked very stressed n tired these days. =) so we sang n practised for 2 hrs plus den i rushed back to the bowling alley to join the rest of the taiwan immersion ppl. juz stayed there for a short while but it was fun. we're going to ECP tml den chinatown den little india. i think it's gonna be damn fun. cant wait fer it.
have you ever loved somebody so much it makes you cry?
urlLink chloe, ruby, linda
urlLink discussing their natl day performance
urlLink break time
urlLink linda n i
urlLink michelle, her taiwan fren, lijuan's taiwan fren, see hui, see hui's taiwan fren....

urlLink felicia chin, joanne peh and michelle chong! all ex-students of vjc. came to our school today for some photo shoot. damn cool la. they're soooooo damn pretty. figure damn good. sakae sushi boss, douglas sth like coming tml i think. wuu...didnt know there are so many famous ppl who were from vj.
urlLink vjc taiwan immersion programme.

really busy these few days. showing the taiwanese girl ard singapore n stuff. met her last saturday. she's linda huang xiao ning. very nice and sweet girl. think most taiwanese girls are like tat. much frenlier and innocent than sporean girls. on sat, shiqing and i brought Linda and Chloe to bugis to shop. had a wonderful time. though we didnt buy anything, but it was still quite fun. linda n chloe bought some snacks tat's only sold in spore. den we wanna ride the trishaw and guess what, the rider actually wanna charge us 50 bucks! what the hell. we didnt not ride in the end. den on sunday was even more fun. in the morning, my family brought linda to taka crystal jade palace to eat tim sum den went to the temple to pray. after tat in the evening, i brought her to meet the rest of the taiwanese ppl at esplanade. ming jie was the tour guide for tat nite. liren was talking non-stop as usual. haha. one funny guy. we went to watch the fireworks. really spectacular. =) everyone actually had their dinner except linda n i. i felt so embarrassed! den the guys were saying tat im abusing linda, didnt feed her well. =p haha. so both of us went to mac to eat but the taiwanese guys ended up taking all my food away! so today was the first day of sch for linda and the rest of the taiwanese ppl. they had to make an intro of themselves on stage in front of the whole school. the guys were really funny. waving their hands so passionately. jianyong was saying the guys from jian guo look like communists and the girls from pei yi look like pasta mania waitress cuz of their uniforms. today was a really shag day for me. damn tired and stressed. think bcuz of the econs test tml. haven really study well for it. was betting with liren. he said i'll pass the test n i said i'll fail hmm..... let's see who wins the bet!
